Brother Brace is a Saradominist monk on Tutorial Island who teaches players how to use Prayer and explains the Friends List and the Ignore List. He also gives new players information about the in-game rules. Players can find him in the chapel on Tutorial Island.

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • He seems to wear a golden holy symbol.

'''Brother Brace''' is a [[Saradomin]]ist [[monk]] on [[Tutorial Island]] who teaches players how to use [[Prayer]] and explains the [[Friends List]] and the [[Ignore List]]. He also gives new players information about the in-game rules. Players can find him in the chapel on Tutorial Island.

==Transcript==
{{Hastranscript|npc}}

==Trivia==
*He seems to wear a golden [[holy symbol]].
